nodes.text: The Nosken system was a star system located in the Prefsbelt sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

Booster Terrik's private Imperial-class Star Destroyer, the Errant Venture, was stationed here for a complete refurbishment in 19 ABY. At the beginning of the Caamas Document Crisis, Talon Karrde and Mara Jade were aboard the Errant Venture when the system was visited by an unidentified starfighter.
